abstract: Delmon Young, who set a Detroit Tigers playoff series record with three home runs against the Yankees in the first round, was left off the roster for the American League Championship Series after straining an oblique muscle in his left side.
snippet: Delmon Young, who set a Detroit Tigers playoff series record with three home runs against the Yankees in the first round, was left off the roster for the American League Championship Series after straining an oblique muscle in his left side.

headline.main: Tigers' Young Is Out for A.L.C.S.
